name: One Way Out (Richard Stamp, Game Dev)
name_original: One Way Out (Richard Stamp, Game Dev)
description:
"One Way Out" Is a short Resident Evil 1-inspired Horror experience made in just over a week.

Made as an exploration into classic gameplay tropes and an excuse to revisit one of my favourite games ever, it was a great experience of systems design and iteration and will no doubt form the basis of a much larger project in the future!

It's playable with Keyboard or PS4 pad. Xbox Pad experience may vary.

Inventory Screen by twitter.com/gemmitygem <3
